/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. On either side of the road, lush green trees and bushes line the way, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze. In the distance, majestic mountains rise against the sky, their peaks shrouded in mist. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene, driving down the road towards the mountains. The colors in the image are vibrant and natural, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image does not contain any text or countable objects, and there are no discernible actions taking place. The relative positions of the objects suggest a peaceful, serene environment, with the road leading the viewer's eye towards the mountains in the background. The image is a beautiful representation of a typical day in Beijing, capturing the city's natural beauty and tranquility.
